title: My Adorable Pregnant Husband - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Drama   Romance   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Breast Fetish   Cohabitation   Comedic Undertone   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doctors   Doting Love Interests   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hospital   Modern Day   Mpreg   Seme Protagonist
author: Shichikawa Koto
description:
Yuge, a 37-year-old virgin OB/GYN, is visited by a man complaining of pain and bleeding in his lower abdomen. He is Iwamoto, a burly young carpenter.

Yuge is at a loss as to the cause of the bleeding. Because no matter how many tests he performs, the symptoms lead to only one possibility: 'A man with perfectly functioning ovaries and uterus.'

On the other hand, Iwamoto is feeling overly anxious and nervous, wondering why he is sent to an OB/GYN. Yuge recommends the guy to do an ultrasound, but...why? What is wrong with him?>
